scripts.all:build: npm run web:build && npm run app:build && npm run admin:build
scripts.all:lint: npm run web:lint && npm run app:lint && npm run admin:lint
scripts.all:test: npm run web:test && npm run app:test && npm run admin:test
scripts.admin:build: npm run build:prep && ng build --project admin --prod --aot
scripts.admin:build:env: npm run build:prep && ng build --project admin --prod --aot --configuration=${environment}
scripts.admin:build:watch: npm run build:prep && ng build --project admin --watch
scripts.admin:start: npm run build:prep && ng serve --project admin --port=4201 --source-map
scripts.admin:start:docker: npm run build:prep && node ./build-util/initial-install.js && ng serve --project admin --port=4201 --source-map --host 0.0.0.0 --disableHostCheck=true
scripts.admin:test: npm run build:prep && npm run admin:lint && ng test --project admin --watch=false --code-coverage --source-map
scripts.admin:test:watch: npm run build:prep && ng test --project admin --code-coverage --source-map
scripts.app:build: npm run build:prep && ionic cordova build --prod --release
scripts.app:ng:build:watch: rimraf ./www/* && npm run build:prep && ng build --project app --sourceMap --watch --deleteOutputPath=false
scripts.app:ng:device:build:watch: rimraf ./www/* && npm run build:prep && ng build --project app --sourceMap --watch --deleteOutputPath=false --configuration=device
scripts.app:ng:emu:build:watch: rimraf ./www/* && npm run build:prep && ng build --project app --sourceMap --watch --deleteOutputPath=false --configuration=emu
scripts.app:prepare: npm run build:prep && ionic cordova prepare --source-map
scripts.app:start: npm run build:prep && ionic cordova run browser --debug --livereload --source-map
scripts.app:start:docker: npm run build:prep && node ./build-util/initial-install.js && ionic cordova run browser --debug --livereload --external --source-map
scripts.build:env: npm run build:prep && ng build --project web --prod --aot --configuration=${environment}
scripts.build:watch: npm run build:prep && npm run web:build:watch
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rimraf ./node_modules && npm run app:clean
scripts.web:build: npm run build:prep && ng build --project web --prod --aot
scripts.web:build:watch: npm run build:prep && ng build --project web --watch
scripts.web:start: npm run build:prep && ng serve --project web --source-map
scripts.web:start:docker: npm run build:prep && node ./build-util/initial-install.js && ng serve --project web --source-map --host 0.0.0.0 --disableHostCheck=true
scripts.web:start:es5: npm run build:prep && ng serve --configuration es5 --project web --source-map
scripts.web:test: npm run build:prep && npm run web:lint && ng test --project web --watch=false --code-coverage --source-map
scripts.web:test:watch: npm run build:prep && ng test --project web --code-coverage --source-map
